description:
This additional content includes:

- "Special Stickers 13" sticker set

Awesome stickers featuring the monsters that appear in Sunbreak!
Have fun communicating with other players using stickers!

- After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Chat Menu.
- The speech bubble will initially be empty. You can enter text in the Chat Menu.
name: "Special Stickers 13" sticker set
